topic.title: Application management added
topic.description: New functionality and dedicated view in the UI allows for adding and maintaining information about NMaaS applications.

topic.title: Language management added
topic.description: New functionality and dedicated view in the UI allows for maintaining translations of labels and texts displayed in the UI and the content of emails in all supported languages.

topic.title: About page added
topic.description: Added dedicated About page with information about current and previous versions of NMaaS and a contact form.

topic.title: Extended nmaas-janitor to use readiness probes
topic.description: A deployed application instance transits to running state when application is actually ready.

topic.title: Setting basic authentication details for application instances
topic.description: Configuration wizards for applications that do not come with build in user management were extended to allow for setting custom user and password on per application instance basis.

topic.title: Layout and translation improvements
topic.description: Several modifications were introduced in order to improve user experience including reworked application comments view and support for application description texts displayed in different languages.

topic.title: New nmaas-janitor component added
topic.description: New component added in order to improve the application instance configuration process to use ConfigMaps.

topic.title: Added support for configuration updates
topic.description: It is now possible to update configuration of already running application instances.

topic.title: New library used for configuration wizard forms generation
topic.description: New library offers many interesting features and is actively developed.

topic.title: Implemented new version of the NMaaS notification service
topic.description: The nmaas-notification component is no longer used. Email templates have been improved.

topic.title: Implemented new application view
topic.description: New version of application view and rating system added to NMaaS.

topic.title: During deployment of Prometheus application, user cannot remove added targets
topic.description: There were some problems with old configuration wizard form generation library. Solved with new library to control that.

topic.title: Removed support for Docker Compose deployment
topic.description: In the current version only container deployment in Kubernetes is supported. Application source code has been cleaned and optimized.

topic.title: Support for Docker Compose and Kubernetes deployment environments
topic.description: NMaaS supports deployment of applications in two container orchestration environments.

topic.title: Support for 6 network management applications
topic.description: Six network management applications were integrated and added to NMaaS portfolio.

topic.title: Support for configuration files storage on GitLab repository
topic.description: Application instance configuration files are stored in dedicated repositories on GitLab.
